entry.title: today
entry.content: Create a new postDo not just seek happiness for yourself. Seek happiness for all. Through kindness. Through mercy. David LevithanWide Awake https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/setup hexo init初始化主目录 npm install安装依赖 hexo clean删除本地已经生成的所有静态文件 hexo g生成静态博客 hexo s开启本地服务器 (http://localhost:4000/) hexo init [folder]新建一个网站数学$\sum{i=0}^N\int{a}^{b}g(t,i)\text{d}t$ hexo new [layout] 新建一篇文章。如果没有设置 layout 的话，默认使用 _config.yml 中的 default_layout 参数代替。如果标题包含空格的话，请使用引号括起来。 hexo server启动服务器 hexo deploy部署网站 代码块12import python print(y) 设置大小 放图片 相对路径图片

entry.title: Hello World 3
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
